Text: this is dubbed in a foreign language
i should clarify, the movie is not in english, it is dubbed in a foriegn language.

It's Portuguese. Imagine being the guy having to dub into their language, trying to make as good a job as Adrian Brody. Pretty futile! That is why language dubs are so retartaning. Much like the the people in the countries where dubbing is still requested:

"Mummy, give me the pacifier NOW!"

By the way; I hate when samples does not reveal any conversational audio...
